flawed_nl_solution:
Sam is currently 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 years old.
Sue is currently 6 / 2 = <<6/2=3>>3 years old.
In three years, Sue will be 3 + 3 = <<3+3=6>>6.
In three years, Same will be 6 + 3 = <<6+3=9>>9.
In three years, Kendra will be 18 + 3 = <<18+3=25>>25.
Their total age in three years is 6 + 9 + 25 = <<6+9+25=40>>40.
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 25. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
